items.title: Master's degree in Economics, Management and Finance
items.text: Currently in the 2nd year of a Master's degree in one of the top French engineering schools, I'm studying Corporate Finance, Market finance, Mergers & Acquisitions, Software development, Theory of Games, Statistics, Econometry and Operational research.

items.title: Engineering Preparatory class
items.text: Intensive and hard working preparatory class for the Grandes Ecoles d'Ingénieur entrance exam on mathematics, physics and engineering science.

items.title: Baccalauréat Scientifique
items.text: with the distinction of the jury.
